portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Explore our completed projects and see the quality craftsmanship that sets Golden Crown apart.

projects.title: Modern Kitchen Transformation
projects.description: Complete kitchen renovation featuring custom cabinetry, quartz countertops, and premium appliances. This project transformed a dated 1980s kitchen into a modern culinary masterpiece.

projects.title: Luxury Master Bathroom Suite
projects.description: Spa-inspired master bathroom renovation with heated floors, custom vanity, and walk-in shower with multiple shower heads.

projects.title: Victorian Home Restoration
projects.description: Complete restoration of a 1920s Victorian home, preserving original character while adding modern amenities and functionality.

projects.title: Basement Family Entertainment Center
projects.description: Transformed an unfinished basement into a multi-functional family entertainment space with home theater, bar area, and game room.
features: Custom wet bar with wine storage

projects.title: Multi-Level Deck & Patio Oasis
projects.description: Custom multi-level deck and patio design creating seamless indoor-outdoor living with built-in seating and outdoor kitchen.

projects.title: Modern Custom Dream Home
projects.description: Ground-up construction of a 4,500 sq ft modern custom home featuring open floor plans, smart home technology, and sustainable materials.

exteriors.title: Exterior Services
exteriors.subtitle: Enhance your home's curb appeal and functionality with our exterior renovation services.

services.title: Decks

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Golden Crown transformed our outdated home into a modern masterpiece. Their attention to detail and professionalism exceeded our expectations.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: The team delivered our dream kitchen on time and within budget. The craftsmanship is exceptional and we couldn't be happier.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.text: From design to completion, Golden Crown made building our custom home a seamless experience. Highly recommended!
